text: Lithops meyeri is a species of living stone (Lithops), under the family Aizoaceae. It is native to Southern Africa and named after Rev. Gottlieb Meyer. == Description == The succulent plant grows with its leaves in pairs of two, with hardly any stem, and very low to the ground. The leaves can be a variety of colors, including: yellow, green, grey, black, organge, purple, etc. == References == meyeri Category:Succulent plants
title: Lithops meyeri
